summary: This document is an internal investigative report analyzing inmate count discrepancies at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died. It details errors in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and Receiving & Discharge (RA/R&D) unit counts, specifically noting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was in an attorney conference during the 4 p.m. count. The report concludes that several official counts were not properly conducted.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as an inmate assigned to the Special Housing Unit (ZA/SHU) who was in an attorney conference during the 4 p.m. institutional count on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Reyes
persons.context: An inmate who was pre-removed from the Special Housing Unit (ZA/SHU) for court at 8:38 a.m. on August 9, 2019, and taken off the log count.

persons.name: Fernandez
persons.context: Inmate #86824-054 who was placed on RA (Receiving & Discharge) dry cell from the Special Housing Unit (ZA/SHU) at 3:15 p.m. on August 9, 2019, but was not properly keyed out of the SHU system, causing count discrepancies.

persons.name: Hemmingway
persons.context: An inmate moved from the Special Housing Unit (ZA) to ES (likely another unit) at 6:34 p.m. on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Reid
persons.context: An inmate moved from the Special Housing Unit (ZA) to ES (likely another unit) at 6:47 p.m. on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Felix
persons.context: An inmate moved from the Special Housing Unit (ZA) to Suicide Watch at 8:21 p.m. on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Williams
persons.context: An inmate moved from the Special Housing Unit (ZA) to Suicide Watch at 8:21 p.m. on August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Garcia-Pena
persons.context: An inmate moved from unit KN to the Special Housing Unit (ZA) at 8:28 p.m. on August 9, 2019.

connections.description: LT was a supervising officer responsible for inmate counts in the unit where Epstein was held.
LT was directly involved in the administrative handling and count correction for inmate Fernandez on August 9, 2019.

events.title: Inmate Count Discrepancies at MCC
events.description: A series of inmate movements and administrative errors in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and Receiving & Discharge (RA/R&D) unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center led to multiple count inaccuracies throughout the day. The report concludes the 4 p.m., 10 p.m., and 12 a.m. SHU counts were not properly conducted.

events.title: Inmate Reyes Removed for Court
events.description: Inmate Reyes was pre-removed from the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for court, reducing the accurate inmate count from 77 to 76.

events.title: Inmate Fernandez Placed in Dry Cell
events.description: Inmate Fernandez was placed on RA (Receiving & Discharge) dry cell from the SHU, but was not properly keyed out of the SHU system, creating the initial count discrepancy.

events.title: 4 p.m. Institutional Count with Epstein in Conference
events.description: The 4 p.m. institutional count showed 76 inmates assigned to the SHU, with 1 (Jeffrey Epstein) in an Attorney Conference. The accompanying 'eyes on' count slip was inaccurate.

keyFacts: This report analyzes inmate count logs from August 9, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
Jeffrey Epstein is noted as being in an attorney conference during the 4 p.m. institutional count on that day.
Significant administrative errors were found, including the failure to properly log inmate Fernandez's move to a dry cell, leading to count inaccuracies.
The report concludes that the 4 p.m., 10 p.m., and 12 a.m. official counts in the Special Housing Unit were not conducted.
The document highlights confusion between the RA (Receiving & Discharge) and R&D units, suggesting possible labeling inconsistencies in the prison's record-keeping.
